title: Strengthening Hospitality Practice Competencies: Online Assistive Technology Design Education for Nursing Care of Individuals with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design a nursing assistance skill development process for individuals with disabilities by applying the five stages of the Falkembach Instructional Design Model.
Learners can produce an online educational content prototype that incorporates accessibility requirements for sensory impairments (visual/auditory).
Learners can analyze problems in the skill development process and propose improvements using reflective practice techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
